page.title: 17JUDO.
page.content: Judo originates from Japan where it is a sport and a form of self defence.Our club,Kyu Shindu,(ky u shin do,)meets at the Kissing Gate Leisure Centre every Tuesday from 7.00p.m to 9.00p.m.to learn the art of judo.Large groups of members of all ages wearing white judo suits of thick fibre,practice breakfalls,throws,hold downs,arm locks and strangles,after carrying out a series of warm up exercises.Inter club competitions are held at regular intervals,and are keenly contested.Gradings are identified using the colour sequence of white,yellow,orange,green,blue,brown and black belts.My current grade is 3 gold tags on my white belt,which I have achieved after being in the club for 6 months.5 members of our club are holders of the black belt.
